website_summaries.verdict: A high-end mountain bike brake that's expertly constructed from premium materials.
pros: Aluminum alloy and plastic deliver an unbeatable mix of versatility and strength
Designed to fit 99% of V-brake bikes
Ideal for kid and adult mountain bikes
cons: Can be hard for first-timers to install

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and easy to install and adjust
customer_reviews.text: This is a really quality replacement product that was easy to install. The springs are strong and it's easy to adjust. It does what it claims and is better than the original brakes that I replaced. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalEagle

customer_reviews.title: Decent upgrade, but weak pads
customer_reviews.text: I am restoring my 1996 GT Backwoods and didn't want to dump a lot of money into parts for an old bike. I decided to upgrade my cantilever brakes with these since the price was right. they are made of 6061 aluminum and branded Wake. The V-Brakes are smooth and work well with my Alivio shifters, but the pads feel a bit mushy. The bike still stops better than it ever did with the cantilevers so I can't really complain. They are a decent buy especially for the money as an upgrade from cantilevers, however I will be replacing the pads soon.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: good price and quality but the pads a junk
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice brake arms with good build quality. The return springs are smooth and proportional which makes them very easy to adjust. The included brake pads are, like others have said, pretty cheap and too soft. They will wear extremely quickly and gives the bike a spongy feel to the brakes. The soft pads also create a lot of squealing which is usual easy to fix by adjusting the toe-in of the pad, but that isn't the case with these pads. My recommendation to other buys would to be to buy these brake arms but replace the pads with a better quality pad that features an offset design.
customer_reviews.author: Juma

customer_reviews.title: Brakes for my girlfriends bike
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has a Specialized Mt. Bike and we bought it used and needed to replace the brakes simply because they were worn out. This set was easily installed and came with everything needed to complete the installation except for the cables which were purchased separately. After installation she was definitely able to stop much quicker. Also adjusting these brakes is much easier than her original set which took way longer simply because they were much older and the spring tension was getting weak. Very happy with this affordable set although definitely not top of the line as far as quality.
customer_reviews.author: Art Harrington

customer_reviews.title: A perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money . A word to the wise . Before you purchase brakes on your bike. Know that there’s like 7-8 different bicycle brake systems. Take a picture of yours and make sure you get the right ones . Other ones might not fit your bike . Be patient when dissembling if you’ve never done this before. I’m a hands on person. Work with all kinds of tools all day . I give this a 5 on my patient scale . After the first one your now a pro . Theirs a bunch of good how to videos on YouTube. I recommend finding one before you start Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Kelp eater

customer_reviews.title: This brand is not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Two sets of clamps? Check! Can I loosen all the screws? Not yet... One of the screws for tightening down on the brake line seems to have be tightened while the paint was still wet. I'm too busy to bother with sending it back or asking for a replacement. This is my review. This brand is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: BRLA_Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 sets of these for two mountain bikes and was very easy to attach and worked perfectly. Would like to recommend the product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Brakes For TREK Tarpon Gary Fisher Mountain Bike
customer_reviews.text: My brakes completely were shot on my mountain bike. I ordered these and was pleased to find that they fit perfect on my mountain bike. They do not make any noise and I am pleased with their stopping power. I put alot of miles on my bike and have had no issues with these.
customer_reviews.author: jonmichi

customer_reviews.title: Parts came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: One of the calipers came incomplete. See photos. The one on top is a complete assembly. The one on bottom is incomplete and will not lock into the bicycle frame.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement brakes for budget beach house bike(s)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a rear brake on a bike that had been sitting in a beach house we purchased. This worked perfectly and was relatively easy to install and adjust. The brake pads seems good too without any squeal which would have driven my wife crazy. Great parts for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Gate to the cable guide is too narrow on these v brakes
customer_reviews.text: I had to use carbide tips on my Dremel to file off the extra metal from the gate on the cable guide. Standard brake noodles didn’t fit. The gate of the cable guide is way too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Toader

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Replaced Tektro brakes on a Trek, only two years old but the spring was dead so they wouldn't pull away from the rim. These have a nice strong spring so I was able to properly adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: DVDbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome.. they fit right in and were delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.text: These brakes were an awesome find. They worked great and saved me from having to buy another bike or take my son's bike to the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Apablaza

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: The kit had everything we needed to change the bicycle brakes and cables. Instructions were confusing but Utube helped us out. Great product and results!
customer_reviews.author: critic at heart

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: An excellent pair of brakes for the price! Kept me safe while riding so far and I am looking forward to testing these brakes out some more. Adjusting was also very straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Jose V. Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Huffy Beach Cruiser. Took about 30 minutes to install because I had to true the wheel at the same time. They work as expected. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I wish it had come with instructions though. I had to look up a video. However, it was super easy to install. I had never installed a bike break before.
customer_reviews.author: MaxwellTurek

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Installed and pulling brake handle and weak metal won’t hold and keeps pulling apart so brakes won’t work. Like tin more than metal.
customer_reviews.author: DaFunk

customer_reviews.title: Trash and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap POS. Broke while installing. Just spend an extra $15 and get the Shimano V brakes on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Alliston

customer_reviews.title: They work very well.
customer_reviews.text: Breaks work great. Was easy to install. An they stop my bike real well. I even have a 80 cc motor on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well with all the parts you need
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and work well. Very happy with all the hardware included. I purchase just to replace 1 set of OEM equipment that broke. Went on easy and works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike Breaks are a MUST
customer_reviews.text: Good bike brakes are essential. The set original to the bike had worn out. These worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: msmaddiecat

customer_reviews.title: Bike Brakes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great price and quick delivery. They also look great on the bike. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect retrofit to replace a cantilever brake set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this V-brake to replace a cantilever brake system that had broken on NEXT bike. This set fit perfectly with the springs fitting the existing holes and brake pads being fully adjustable to make the best contact. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: J Oommen

customer_reviews.title: Look & built nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed em yet, but they look like they gonna work out perfectly
customer_reviews.author: thomas forshey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This style allowed me to install fenders on my alien version hoo Koo e Koo by GF. Need fenders in Toledo .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.  Not universal.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible brakes. They don’t when work well. Not universal. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Car

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Noodle was a Bit Tight in the Holder.
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well except I had to slightly enlarge the hole for the noodle. The noodle is soft aluminum and trying to fit it into the holder marred it up. This should a snug but removable connection so you can release your brakes to remove the rim. This was not a huge deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: G Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, fast delivery. Good replacement for factory pedals
customer_reviews.author: Dan Spernick

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: didnt come with any instruction had to youtube how to properly adjust and the brakes. all in all works well after adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Longbehn

customer_reviews.title: Good Brakes
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with missing parts, but customer service sent a replacement. Good brakes so far.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: All good. Delivered and installed same day. I'd never replaced brakes on a bike but it was pretty easy. Packaged well and contained parts as described. Good value IMO.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sheffer

customer_reviews.title: They allow fine adjustment and are much better than the brakes I ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install for the novice but once this done, the brakes work very well. They allow fine adjustment and are much better than the brakes I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Noble

customer_reviews.title: Those are the brakes
customer_reviews.text: These brakes lacked instructions, though installed easily. They aren’t on par with the high end setups, but for value, they don’t break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: All pieces contained, everything sturdy and proper size. Worked perfectly even for a non-expert.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Ymous

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works very well with my bike. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Didnt want to hold alingment well
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as they would not hold position. Got some tektro ones instead and those worked great. Pads are considerable smaller than pads I had on old set.
customer_reviews.author: twolfy

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for your brakes...
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed to replace my brakes... The affordability of it the ease of installation is valued... They work in all weather conditions...
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: This worked well as a replacement on a small kids bike. Should work well on standard bikes as well. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Giambrone

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product - had to replace a rear brake on daughter's bike. Easy install. This worked out great and now I have an extra for future replacement!
customer_reviews.author: rhhn2003

customer_reviews.title: Product different than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.text: The product does work fine on my bike, but the "force adjusting screw rebound" is plastic instead of metal. I had bought it specifically because it was metal, since I was replacing a brake arm with a "broken" plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: j. f.

customer_reviews.title: Brakes
customer_reviews.text: This units fit fine Took some time to adjust the brakes
customer_reviews.author: Tom K. Arita

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace an old set of v-brakes on a motorized bike, stops like a charm now
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Screws are too short to install it
customer_reviews.text: The screws that came with the brake are not long enough to go all the way through, so it won't install. It also did not come with I dtructions.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Tried installing one of the sets and while adjusting it the metal spring piece bent and then it wouldn't work well. Tried bending the tiny bar back but didn't help. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great brakes at a very reasonable price. Used these to replace the worn out brakes on my daughter’s bike. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kevin lehman

customer_reviews.title: Front and rear bike brakes.
customer_reviews.text: Not made like photo....did not fit bike.... had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Loxahatchee Joe

customer_reviews.title: Well made as works as it shouldCheaply made and will not center no matter what I tried
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and will not center no matter what I tried...buy the higher priced stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Randall R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and back to safe operation...
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions, easy enough to install, and readily back to a safe braking environment on my bicycle. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: RaeKay

customer_reviews.title: Great kit 130mm tall arms/Clears Fenders fine.Good tight springs.Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good as a Deore long arm set.Strong+snappy springs.Good lever snap back.Works great+Brake pads too! Yahoo! Price is right.Cantilevers to v-Brakes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes Bicycle+E-Bike Repairs,98683Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I used these brake arms to replace a set on a recently purchased bike. The existing brakes chattered with light pressure. These arms were a little beefier an operate smoothly under all conditions. Very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade the pads that come with these
customer_reviews.text: Brake pads are crap that come with these V brakes, best to replace with better pads, hardware is nice and fits and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bugwit

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Swapped out easily on my kids bike. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: I buy dad stuff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Breaks work great so far that stop me every time hope it continues
customer_reviews.author: MIKE DOWNS

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received the brakes missing half of the components i.e. the break boot the brake noodle and the mounting lugs. So basically they were useless. Going to try again and if not a go on the second shot will go for something else
customer_reviews.author: Justin DeMoura

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$$$$
customer_reviews.text: Nuts and bolts stripped. They are not hardened steel. Actually, I think they may be aluminum - not sure. In any case, I ended up having to just trash em and bought some LDC brakes!
customer_reviews.author: A W

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect for my project. Seem to be great quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Perego

customer_reviews.title: Cheap not much more positive to say
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, these parts appear to be very cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Max O Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Pefrect Fit  Hassel Free
customer_reviews.text: It took 30 minutes each to install and adjust the brakes. I had to go online for instruction, but very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Demby

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was fed up with my ineffective rear brake on my hybrid 700c tire size bike. I couldn't be more pleased with my new brakes. Good quality at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H Van Jepmond

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: The brake pads were slightly smaller than the ones I had but seem to work very well and were easy to install and adjust. I would definitely order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sica

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Got the brakes installed and took my bike out to make sure they worked and the front brake immediately broke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item but faulty delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good item but one of the brakes was delivered faulty so couldn't install the second pair
customer_reviews.author: Bachelorette

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Came without the bolts to mount them to the bike! Also didn’t include the the boots or noodles! So they’re useless!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Prescott

customer_reviews.title: These brakes are the best.
customer_reviews.text: No problem. These bike brakes really do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome upgrade for most brakes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome upgrade for most brakes. Orderwas delivered very quickly. I am impressed. I would recommend highly. Price good, quality same.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Pads are not good. Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Brake mechanics seem good, but the pad tore off after first ride. Going to try and reach out to company.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Allen wrench slides inside bolts.
customer_reviews.text: Allen wrench slides around inside the bolt as if it’s already stripped. They look nice, but are not really functional.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: 4 left side clamps!
customer_reviews.text: Received for "left side" clamps, no right side clamps, requiring a return. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Used you tube to follow instructions. Worked as good as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Best value on Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: They fit the bike everything was a snap thanks Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Complete brakes set easier installation
customer_reviews.text: You Tube gives a step by step on how to install the brake system
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Grandma

product_meta.title: Bike Brakes Mountain Bike V Brakes Set Replacement Fit for Most Bicycle, Road Bike, MTB, BMX (Aluminum Alloy, 1 Pair)
product_meta.description:
LITEONE V Brakes, YOUR BEST CHOICE


Feature: 
V-Type Brake
Material: Aluminum alloy and Plastic
Arch Size: 110mm 
Brake Pads Size: 55mm
Scope of application: V type brake of bicycle. 
Aluminum alloy production, strong and durable. 
Installation is simple, suitable for most of the use of V brake bicycle. 

NOTE
Please confirm whether your bike has a V brake installation hole first. 



Note: If you see someting like rusty, it not rusty, just butter. The butter will be used to prevent to rust, prolong service life
feature_bullets: Material: Alloy and Plastic, Strong and Durable
